Specification: Aquamira’s Frontier Pro Ultralight Water Filter System is a highly effective water treatment system that fits in your pocket.,Drink directly from any water source or fill up a bottle or bladder, attach the Frontier Pro filter and start drinking! Use it as a hanging drip filter, too.,The Frontier Pro is effective for up to 50 gallons of water and uses Aquamira’s advanced Miraguard™ Antimicrobial Technology to suppress the growth of algae, fungus, mold and mildew in the filter.,The Frontier Pro removes over 99.9% of Cryptosporidium and Giardia as well as dangerous microorganisms from source water, without tablets or waiting.,It’s compact, lightweight and easy to use.
Olive Drab W/Aluminum Foil Mat Bottom W/2 Elastic Ties, Thermal,,Reflective Aluminum Foil Bottom Mat Retains Heat,,Measures: 180 X 60 X 1cm

Rothco's Deluxe Survival Knife is the ultimate survival knife featuring a ton of essential tools to help you in any emergency situation.,The blade length of the knife is 5 1/2 and the total length of the knife is 10 1/2
Heavy Duty Steel Construction

Perfect for campers who need a lot of space, the Cache 4p tent is a base camp/family style tent with lots of space and storage to keep organized and camp easier. ,The unique pole design has a large footprint, excellent stability, and near vertical walls for more livability. ,Dual doors make access quick and easy.  The available Annex vestibule (sold separately) attaches to either door and offers extra storage and covered activity space.,Tents include: canopy, fly, poles, stakes, stuff sacks, and guy lines.  Footprint and Annex sold separately.,Pack weight: 14lbs 12oz. Floor area 64 sq. ft. 4 Person. Three season

Order up some adventure with a side of water in the Newport H2 from KEEN.,Ready for adverse conditions, the razor sipped outsole and 3mm lugs provide excellent traction.,The washable polyester webbing upper features the odor-reducing Aegis Microbe Shield®.,KEEN patented toe protection lets you follow any path, whether to rivers or trails.

Lightweight versatility with best in class space-to-weight ratio. Get more space, protection, and lengthen your usable season with the Hat-Trick series.,This full-featured tent delivers user-friendly features like large entry doors, protected vestibules, Pole-Pilot™ setup sleeves and semi-attachable fly without needing a pack mule.,Easton carbon fiber poles shave weight and add strength. The perfect shelter for those wanting extra wiggle room or needing space for gear-intensive excursions.,Hat-Trick is made with Carbon EVO Pole System with shockcord.,EVO is stronger and lighter than aluminum and sets the new standard in high performance tent frames.,Tent includes: canopy, fly, poles, stakes, stuff sacks, and guy lines. Footprint sold separately.,Pack weight: 5lbs 3oz. Floor area: 40.4 sq.ft. 2 person. All season.

Description:
Comfy, grippy, low profile. Cottonmouth Nose Plugs offer the latest in quality, design and style. They keep the water out without feeling like your nose is in a vice. It's bite is gentle.



  • Made with a high-quality wire that has both strength and durability.

  • The wire is covered, so the nose padding grips well and resists separating.

  • Built to last in Asheville, North Carolina.
Specification: Comfy, grippy, low profile. Cottonmouth Nose Plugs offer the latest in quality, design and style. They keep the water out without feeling like your nose is in a vice. It's bite is gentle.

Description:
NRS Pennel Orca® raft and inflatable kayak repair kit. Contains the essentials for emergency boat material and Leafield valve repair. This is the same kit that comes with a new NRS Hypalon raft or IK.



  • Repair parts are fitted in a water resistant dry box, with gasket-lined lid.

  • This kit is intended to give you the basics to make an emergency on-the-water repair. See the parts list for the included items.

  • Other items, such as Toluene and Clifton Hypalon Accelerator (sold separately), are recommended for more complete, long lasting repair jobs.

  • If you do not have an NRS boat, some of the items, such as the valve parts, may not work on your boat.
Specification: NRS Pennel Orca® raft and inflatable kayak repair kit. Contains the essentials for emergency boat material and Leafield valve repair. This is the same kit that comes with a new NRS Hypalon raft or IK.
productname: NRS Pennel Orca Raft and Inflatable Kayak Repair Kit

Description:
The easy-to read digital display of the NRS Digital Pressure Gauge helps you keep the air pressure in your inflatable raft, cataraft, kayak, SUP or body board exactly where you want it.



  • This accurate gauge can save you a ton of headache and expense.

  • Waterproof casing will make sure that your gauge can handle life on the river.

  • Large, black-on-gray digital display is simple to read. Especially helpful for those with poor eyesight.

  • Gauge tip fits Leafield and military valves.

  • Rubberized housing makes this gauge easy to handle and protects it from impact.

  • Compact, sturdy design works on nearly any inflatable boat valve.
Specification: The easy-to read digital display of the NRS Digital Pressure Gauge helps you keep the air pressure in your inflatable raft, cataraft, kayak, SUP or body board exactly where you want it.

Description:
Favored by commercial outfitters for its high strength-to-weight ratio, this 7.5" x 21.5" reinforced blade is fitted with a 1-1/8" aluminum shaft.


The shaft is covered with high-density polyethylene to provide a grip that resists nicks, dents and oxidation, and gives a warmer feel than bare aluminum.
Specification: Favored by commercial outfitters for its high strength-to-weight ratio, this 7.5" x 21.5" reinforced blade is fitted with a 1-1/8" aluminum shaft. ,The shaft is covered with high-density polyethylene to provide a grip that resists nicks, dents and oxidation, and gives a warmer feel than bare aluminum.

productname: NRS Revolution & Osprey Raft Urethane Repair Kit

Description:
The NRS RiverBed Sleeping Pad lets you sleep like a rock even if you're sleeping on a rock. Designed for multiday raft trips, this waterproof camp bed is perfect for camping by boat or by car.



  • Rugged, waterproof PVC exterior holds up to all the use and abuse you can throw at it.

  • Our exclusive dual-density foam shields you from rocks, sticks and pine cones while providing pillow-soft comfort.

  • Top-quality Leafield C7 valve lets you use your raft pump to inflate the pad for extra cushion.

  • Two cinch straps with quick-release buckles help you roll your sleeping pad compactly for easy transport.

  • For rafters and other boaters, laying the NRS RiverBed over a cooler or dry box provides extra insulation and a comfortable seat.
Specification: The NRS RiverBed Sleeping Pad lets you sleep like a rock even if you're sleeping on a rock. Designed for multiday raft trips, this waterproof camp bed is perfect for camping by boat or by car.

Description:
Why pump by hand if you don't have to? Let the NRS Blast Inflator Pump do the work for you. Its compact size and rugged durability will last for years. 



  • This 12-volt pump is capable of inflating to 1.5 psi for a fast and easy inflation. For many inflatable crafts you'll still want to have a hand pump for top off to full pressure and to take along with you on the water. It also deflates making it quick and easy to get your inflatable packed back up.

  • Comes with an adapter to fit a wide variety of valve types.

  • Inlayed rubber insulates from heat and sound while providing a more secure grip.

  • 12 foot power cord allows you to easily inflate your boat near your vehicle.

  • It's easy to deflate with the Blast Pump. There are two ports on the pump - one where the air enters the pump and one where the air blows out. Simply disconnect the nozzle from the outlet side of the pump (it twists on and off) and connect it to the intake side.

  • There is a small hole in the pump nozzle. It's there to prevent back pressure buildup that can cause the pump to overheat.

  • The Alligator clamps allow quick and easy connection to your vehicle's battery.
Specification: Why pump by hand if you don't have to? Let the NRS Blast Inflator Pump do the work for you. Its compact size and rugged durability will last for years.

Description:
KEY FEATURES:
The Hydrobloc® Proofing Cream has been specifically formulated and developed for the full grain leathers (smooth and waxy finished), to protect them and enhance their water resistance and appearance.


The constant use of Hydrobloc Proofing Cream guarantees a smooth and elastic leather. Also suitable for GORE-TEX® lined footwear, with Full Grain Leather upper.

category: Home,Footwear
Description:
KEY FEATURES:
The socks Zamberlan ® are made by combining the most refined natural and synthetic fibers, for maximum comfort and durability in outdoor activities and to improve the fit and comfort.


The construction is technically developed taking into account all the important elements for a sock like this: pressure, perspiration, circulation stimulation and position of the foot in the shoe.
Specification: KEY FEATURES:,The socks Zamberlan ® are made by combining the most refined natural and synthetic fibers, for maximum comfort and durability in outdoor activities and to improve the fit and comfort.,The construction is technically developed taking into account all the important elements for a sock like this: pressure, perspiration, circulation stimulation and position of the foot in the shoe.

category: Home,Footwear
Description:
Thick socks for intensive use | cold conditions

Thick socks for rigorous use  and intense cold conditions, featuring high wool content. and ventilation shafts for evaporation of moisture.


 



  • Source Socks were especially designed  for your outdoor adventures.

  • Contains Merino wool for a dry and comfy feel.

  • Ergonomic Cushioning  specifically fitted for left and right foot.

  • Flat toe seam prevents blisters and friction.

  • The Cupron yarn is made with Copper Oxide embedded into the fibers providing a durable technology that is effective throughout the product's life.

  • Copper is a natural mineral that is essentially consumed by our bodies, vital for skin growth.

  • Copper improves the skin's appearance and kills most bacteria & fungi that can cause odor.

  • Copper is non water soluble and environmentally friendly.

  • Cupron is made from recycled copper.

  • Israeli Technology - MADE IN ITALY
Specification:
Thick socks for intensive use | cold conditions

Thick socks for rigorous use  and intense cold conditions, featuring high wool content. and ventilation shafts for evaporation of moisture.,

category: Home,Footwear
Description:
KEY FEATURES:
The Hydrobloc® Water Based Conditioner has been specifically formulated and developed for the nabuk, split (also split/fabric) and rough-out (or reversed) leathers, to enhance their water resistance and appearance and to protect them.
Specification: KEY FEATURES:,The Hydrobloc® Water Based Conditioner has been specifically formulated and developed for the nabuk, split (also split/fabric) and rough-out (or reversed) leathers, to enhance their water resistance and appearance and to protect them.

category: Home,Footwear
Description:
Padded Trekking socks | variable weather conditions


Padded trekking socks for variable weather with anatomic cushioning and ventilation panels.


Source Socks were especially designed  for your outdoor adventures.


Contains Merino wool for a dry and comfy feel.


Ergonomic Cushioning  specifically fitted for left and right foot.


Flat toe seam prevents blisters and friction.


The Cupron yarn is made with Copper Oxide embedded into the fibers providing a durable technology that is effective throughout the product's life.


Copper is a natural mineral that is essentially consumed by our bodies, vital for skin growth.


Copper improves the skin's appearance and kills most bacteria & fungi that can cause odor.


Copper is non water soluble and environmentally friendly.


Cupron is made from recycled copper.


Israeli Technology - MADE IN ITALY

Description:
Keep your cool under pressure with the Voyageur hiking shoe from KEEN.


Mesh lining replaces a waterproof barrier for continual airflow.


The rugged outsole finds a sure grip on rough terrain with multi-directional lugs.


An ESS shank is built in for torsional stability, letting you keep your mind on the task at hand.

- Dual density compression molded EVA midsole
- Heel support structure
- Non-marking rubber outsole
- Removable metatomical dual density EVA footbed
- Torsion stability ESS shank
- Water resistant leather upper

category: Home,Footwear
Description:
USE:
Our high cut kids' boot for their hikes and walks.

KEY FEATURES:
The 176 SOLAR GT RR is a new unisex boot for kids. A unique boot produced by Zamberlan and made with the best Hydrobloc® split leather around lower foot and upper ankle for stability and support . Large fabric panels provide better breathability and are produced along the lines of a growing foot perfectly respecting its anatomy. The suede leather, combined with technological textiles, makes SOLAR functional in any seasons. These shoes are built to be resistant and comfortable while the pieced upper design improves flexibility, the Vibram® sole with cushioning effect and the outsole isolate and protect the feet. Microtex wicking nylon colar lining help control excess moisture. GORE-TEX® extended comfort lining for water protection and exceptional breathability makes the fitting of this shoe extremely pleasant.
